arcade.core.util

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.util.Graph

  • public final class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for directed graph using nodes as hashes.

    Edge objects represent edges in the graph and Node objects represent nodes in the graph. Nodes may have more than one edge in or out.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Graph.Edge
      Nested class representing a graph edge.
      static interface  Graph.GraphFilter
      Defines a filter for edges in a graph.
      static class  Graph.Node
      Nested class representing a graph node.

      • getSubgraph

        public void getSubgraph(Graph g,
                        Graph.GraphFilter f)
        Filters this graph for edges and copies them to the given graph object.

        Notes that the links in the subgraph are not correct.

        Parameters:
        g - the graph to add filtered edges to
        f - the edge filter

        Returns:
